content.explanation:
1. Factor: 6x² + 13x + 6
2. Factor: 12x² - 11x + 2
3. Factor: x³ - 27
4. Factor: x³ + 64
5. Factor: 3x⁴ - 48
6. Factor: 2(x - 3)² + 5(x - 3) - 3
7. Factor completely: 4x⁴ - 4x²
8. Factor completely: 2x³ + 54x
